Far North Bear Claws.name: Far North Bear Claws
Far North Bear Claws.description:
This set of knuckles designed to aid in hand-to-hand combat. They are crafted to resemble a giant bear's claws, made of steel, and feature a slot at the top of each knuckle for placing enchanted gems. However, heavy use might cause the gem to shatter, resulting in the loss of its enchantment.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Belt.name: Far North Belt
Far North Belt.description: Built from layers of hardened leather, cloth, and insulating white fox fur, this belt protects against deep northern cold. Its main utility is to hold easily accessible pouches and potions, as well as heavy weaponry such as swords or hammers.

Far North Boots.name: Far North Boots
Far North Boots.description: Boots crafted from oiled sealskin and fox pelt reach to the knee, their inward-facing fur offering warmth. Due to their rigid, stiff nature, experienced travelers always soften them at a campfire or put a thick felted sock to slide them on comfortably.

Far North Cape.name: Far North Cape
Far North Cape.description: The heavy, hooded cloak is made from the hide of a great white bear, rendering it one of the heaviest capes available. Following a lengthy curing process, Leatherworkers must cut the hide, stain it a deep shade with a specialize dye, and line the interior with additional fur for warmth.

Far North Cloth.name: Far North Cloth
Far North Cloth.description:
Made from the wool of the moose, the greasy felt is heavy, dense, and water-resistant. It is never worn as a fine garment, but rather to protect the body from the harsh Northern elements, it's main drawback being noticeably heavy.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Crown.name: Far North Crown
Far North Crown.description: Far North Crown is not a symbol of authority but rather one of dominance over the frozen wasteland. Generally made from iron, and on some occasion even from pelt, the crown does not signify that the wearer rules people, but that they have mastered the land itself.

Far North Dye.name: Far North Dye
Far North Dye.description: Far North Dye is ground from purple ochre, a rare variant of the ochre gemstone, which is ground into a fine powder. Though uncommon in the region, it is one of the most frequently used dyes in the northern realms, as it provides strong visibility from a distance on the light colored pelts it is typically applied to.

Far North Epaulets.name: Far North Epaulets
Far North Epaulets.description: Far North Epaulets are crafted from the pelts and fur of arctic wolves, mounted on a sturdy leather base, and bound together with steel bolts. Beyond providing protection from large animal bites and axe blows, they also serve to secure the wearer's cape in place.

Far North Gloves.name: Far North Gloves
Far North Gloves.description: Made from three specific layers, one on top of the other to provide protection in cold environments. The inside layer features soft fox fur for warmth, the middle layer consists of felted wool for further insulation, and the outside layer is made from heavy hide to be water resistant.

Far North Great Axe.name: Far North Great Axe
Far North Great Axe.description:
The head of this massive axe is made from a single piece of black, frozen iron found only in the heart of deep glaciers. While very few blacksmiths know how to work it, it is believed that divine intervention is needed to complete the making of this axe.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Hammer.name: Far North Hammer
Far North Hammer.description:
Steel-made weapon and utility tool intended for cleaving through frozen landscapes and breaching battlefield defenses. It is designed to be as versatile as possible while remaining easy to carry, either on a belt or within a backpack.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Helm.name: Far North Helm
Far North Helm.description: Made primarily of hardened pelt and fox fur, with two narwhal tusks protruding from each side, it is built to last and remain sturdy in harsh northern climates. Due to its padded nature, it is also quite well equiped to handle a devastating blow.

Far North Pants.name: Far North Pants
Far North Pants.description: Leatherworkers use heavy and thick leather from Nordic bears or seals to make these, cutting the material loosely to allow for unrestricted movement and to accommodate additional woolen layers worn underneath for protection from the elements.

Far North Ring.name: Far North Ring
Far North Ring.description: Primarily made out of stone and marked with the symbols of a specific tribe or village, this item is more of a memento of home. It holds no monetary value, however, some collectors are interesting in them as all of them are unique, as they are not made by experienced jewelers, but by masons.

Far North Shortbow.name: Far North Shortbow
Far North Shortbow.description:
Made from an alloy of steel and brass to be as flexible as possible, with a string fashioned from steel and nickel, this shortbow requires the strength of a giant to be fully drawn. The user must be careful, as applying more strength than necessary can permanently bend the bow, rendering it unusable, they must be powerful but graceful.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Staff.name: Far North Staff
Far North Staff.description:
A walking aid, a tool, and a weapon, this staff is a length of driftwood recovered from the cold northern shores. At its end, it has a gemmed cap with an enchanted gem that is favored by the user. Usually, the enchantments used are those that protect from extreme cold temperatures.

Note for DMs

This item possesses no fixed stats, this is by design. The GM/DM is advised to modify the stats to best fit their world, setting and story. Due to those factors, all stats can vary wildly.

Far North Vambrances.name: Far North Vambrances
Far North Vambrances.description: These vambraces are designed to protect the forearms from biting wind and freezing temperatures. They form a sealed connection with the wearer's gloves to block out cold and are lined with fur for added warmth, creating a barrier against the extreme cold environment.
